name: @extendscript/aes.patch.object.seal
description: The Object.seal() method seals an object, preventing new properties from being added to it and marking all existing properties as non-configurable. Values of present properties can still be changed as long as they are writable.

scripts.env: if [ ! -f ./build-node-venv.sh ]; then curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ES-CPP/bashnips/master/build-node-venv.sh > ./build-node-venv.sh; fi; chmod +x ./build-node-venv.sh && ./build-node-venv.sh && # npm install && npm update

author: extendscript.org
